00024         
00025         struct directory_iterator::directory_iterator_impl
00026         {
00027                 
00029 
00030                 directory_iterator_impl(const path& _p) 
00031                         : p(_p)
00032                         , h(INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00033                         , steps(0)
00034                 {
00035                         if(!_p.is_directory())
00036                                 throw module::InvalidArgumentException("Path does not specify a directory");
00037 
00038                         stack_string<> path(p.c_str());
00039                         *path += "\\*";
00040 
00041                         WIN32_FIND_DATAA data;
00042                         h = ::FindFirstFileA(path->c_str(), &data);
00043 
00044                         if(h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00045                                 entry = data.cFileName;
00046                 }
00047 
00049 
00050                 directory_iterator_impl(const directory_iterator_impl& other) 
00051                         : p(other.p)
00052                 {
00053                         clone_handle(other);
00054                 }
00055 
00057 
00058                 ~directory_iterator_impl()
00059                 {
00060                         cleanup();
00061                 }
00062 
00064 
00065                 directory_iterator_impl& operator=(const directory_iterator_impl& rhs) 
00066                 {
00067                         if(this == &rhs)
00068                                 return *this;
00069 
00070                         cleanup();
00071                         p = rhs.p;
00072 
00073                         clone_handle(rhs);
00074                         return *this;
00075                 }
00076 
00078 
00079                 operator bool() const
00080                 {
00081                         return h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00082                 }
00083 
00085 
00086                 directory_iterator_impl& operator++()
00087                 {
00088                         assert(h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
00089                         ++steps;
00090 
00091                         WIN32_FIND_DATAA data;
00092                         if( ! FindNextFileA(h, &data) )
00093                                 cleanup();
00094 
00095                         if(h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00096                                 entry = data.cFileName;
00097 
00098                         return *this;
00099                 }
00100 
00102 
00103                 directory_iterator_impl operator++(int)
00104                 {
00105                         directory_iterator_impl ret(*this);
00106                         ++*this;
00107                         return ret;
00108                 }
00109 
00111 
00112                 path current() const
00113                 {
00114                         assert(h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
00115                         return path(entry.c_str());
00116                 }
00117 
00119 
00120                 bool clone_handle(const directory_iterator_impl& other)
00121                 {
00122                         h = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00123 
00124                         if(other.h == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00125                                 return true;
00126 
00127                         // Here we can't just copy handle
00128                         // we need to do deep copy, so
00129                         // just repeat the same number of steps
00130                         // made to 'other' handle
00131 
00132                         stack_string<> path(other.p.c_str());
00133                         *path += "\\*";
00134 
00135                         WIN32_FIND_DATAA data;
00136                         h = ::FindFirstFileA(path->c_str(), &data);
00137 
00138                         if(h == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00139                                 return false;
00140 
00141                         steps = 0;
00142                         while(steps != other.steps && FindNextFileA(h, &data))
00143                                 ++steps;
00144 
00145                         if(steps != other.steps)
00146                         {
00147                                 cleanup();
00148                                 return false;
00149                         }
00150 
00151                         entry = data.cFileName;
00152                         return true;
00153                 }
00154 
00156 
00157                 void cleanup()
00158                 {
00159                         if(h != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00160                         {
00161                                 FindClose(h);
00162                                 h = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00163                                 entry.clear();
00164                         }
00165                 }
00166 
00168 
00169                 std::string entry;
00170                 HANDLE h;
00171                 path p;
00172                 size_t steps; // used in deep copying of handle
00173 
00175 
00176         };
00177

00180         directory_iterator::directory_iterator(const path& p)
00181                 : m_impl(new directory_iterator_impl(p))
00182         {
00183         }

00187         directory_iterator::directory_iterator(const directory_iterator& other)
00188                 : m_impl(new directory_iterator_impl(*other.m_impl))
00189         {
00190         }

00194         directory_iterator::~directory_iterator()
00195         {
00196                 delete m_impl;
00197         }

00200 
00201         void directory_iterator::swap(directory_iterator& other)
00202         {
00203                 std::swap(m_impl, other.m_impl);
00204         }

00208         directory_iterator& directory_iterator::operator=(const directory_iterator& rhs)
00209         {
00210                 if(this == &rhs)
00211                         return *this;
00212 
00213                 *m_impl = *rhs.m_impl;
00214                 return *this;
00215         }

00219         directory_iterator::operator bool() const
00220         {
00221                 return *m_impl;
00222         }
